body.p: The separated text components are linked using the @prev and @next attributes with the help of @xml:id's.
If the text passage is interrupted several times, the successive parts are linked together, in doing so the first part of the chain contains no @prev and the last part no @next.
Example: Parallel print of two texts on opposite book pages

note.i: Alternative regulation phase 1: Continuous footnotes and endnotes represent a special case for the interruption of related text passages, which is dealt with by means of the <seg> element (see chapters Continuous Footnotes and Endnotes).
